GSD.description:
rtl818x: Prevent using not initialized queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 9d5e96cc1f1720019ce27b127a31695148d38bb0. For more details please see the references link.
